TERMS.TITLE: Terms and Conditions

INTRO.TITLE: Introduction
INTRO.TEXT: Welcome to our application. By accessing or using this app, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms and Conditions.

CHATBOT.TITLE: Chatbot Access and Usage
CHATBOT.INTRO: Our chatbot is accessible to all users. However, please note the following usage conditions:
CHATBOT.TEST_KEY: All users are permitted to use a test API key, which grants access to a limited number of messages.
CHATBOT.FULL_ACCESS: To enjoy full access and unlock additional features, you must sign up within the app. Registered users gain enhanced message limits and other exclusive benefits.
CHATBOT.OPENSOURCE: Additionally, please note that this application is open-source. We encourage users to explore the source code and contribute to its development.

RESPONSIBILITIES.TITLE: User Responsibilities
RESPONSIBILITIES.INTRO: As a user of this application, you agree to the following responsibilities:
RESPONSIBILITIES.ACCURATE_INFO: Provide accurate and complete information when registering.
RESPONSIBILITIES.RESPECT: Respect the rights of other users and refrain from any abusive behavior.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.TEXT: Your privacy is important to us. Please read our Privacy Policy to understand how we handle your personal information.

LIABILITY.TITLE: Limitation of Liability
LIABILITY.TEXT: We are not responsible for any damages or losses resulting from your use of this application.

CHANGES.TITLE: Changes to Terms
CHANGES.TEXT: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. You will be notified of any significant changes.

TERMS.CONTACT: If you have any questions about these Terms, please
